channel.title: Stupid dupers! i need help!
channel.description: ok my source is deltascape. and i have the accept and decline dupe done. and close window trade done. but people still dupe. what other dupes are there!? so i can disable all them! please help! explain the dupe to me so i understand.

item.title: Stupid dupers! i need help!
item.dc:creator: @Shadow_hell Shadow hell
item.description:
@Shadow_hell wrote:

OK. So you know how in your inventory you can move items around? Well they start switching 2 itesms aorund really fast nad for a split second the item they want duped is in 2 slots. At that exact moment they drop the item in the second spot on to the gorund. Tehn they pick it Back up.
i hope u can get this fixed. My best Regards.

~Shadow Hell

Read full topic

item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

i dont really get it. switch around then drop?

item.title: Stupid dupers! i need help!
item.dc:creator: @Shadow_hell Shadow hell
item.description:
@Shadow_hell wrote:

I think that there is one that u have the tiem u want to dupe and a random item. You switch them alot really quick and at one time theyâ€™ll to of the item then they drop the item while its ther then the other item is gone. So then they pick the duped item off the gorund and they ahve two of that item. I am not sure how to fix it tho srry:( but i think thats one of the other ways they dupe. My best regards

~ Shadow Hell
